duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide first-line customer support by assisting shoppers, answering questions, locating merchandise, and assisting with the check-out process.
Play a fundamental role in the proper and timely merchandising of the store, including stocking, displaying merchandise, and ensuring accurate pricing.
Unload and sort merchandise, process and return go-backs, repack merchandise, and break down cardboard boxes.
Retrieve shopping carts from the parking lot and report any illegal activity by customers or employees to Store Management.
Follow Company safety procedures, work independently, and clean up spills, floors, shelves, displays, and bathrooms.
